# identifiers

**Instance Property**

The message identifiers to locate in your search.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifiers: [String]? { get }
```

## Discussion

When this property contains one or more [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] objects, your search should return only messages whose IDs match the specified identifiers. The value of the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent/identifiersOperator] property determines whether searches should be for all, some, or none of the specified identifiers.

## Specifying Message Identifiers

- **identifiersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the identifiers in the search criteria.
- **conversationIdentifiers**: The conversation identifiers to locate in your search.
- **conversationIdentifiersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the conversation identifiers in the search criteria.
- **notificationIdentifiers**: The notification identifiers to locate in your search.
- **notificationIdentifiersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the notification identifiers in the search criteria.
